item.title: M-Appeal Picks Up Rights to David Pablos’ ‘On the Road’ Ahead of Venice World Premiere (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Berlin-based sales outfit M-Appeal has picked up international rights to David Pablos’ “On the Road” (“En El Camino”). The film, a bold, tender Mexican road movie, will have its world premiere at the
